page.title: 11Religion
page.content: The{Parish Church}of{St. Oswald, {Newton-U-Roseberry, Pinchinthorpe {Methodist Church}are the{only two places of{worship}in our{block}and serve those{rural communites.}The church of{St. Oswald}is of{ancient {origin,built}of{stone}in the{Norman {style}consists of{chancel,nave,south {porch,western tower with belfry.}In {1901}the tower,containing the{choir {gallery}and{organ loft}was{erected,a {new oak roof}installed,the{church {refloored,chancel screen}and{stone {altar}were{erected.}The cost of the work involved amounting to just over {Â£1,000.}The{registers}date back to {1725.People}in the{private estates}on the{outskirts}of{Guisborough worship in{churches built}in the{older parts of the{town. St.Nicholas Parish,(15th {C.),Methodist,St Paulinus,Catholic, {Salvation Army}and{Pentecostal.
